summary: Build a professional, mobile-responsive business website for a local welding and fabrication workshop named "SK Welding Works" with an industrial design, key marketing sections (hero, about, services, why choose us, gallery, contact, footer), and business conversion features (call/WhatsApp, inquiry form) plus SEO optimization.
architectural_notes: Design style: industrial professional look; dark gray base with yellow/orange accents; bold headings and clean fonts.
Site should include smooth scrolling and hover effects across sections.
Include WhatsApp floating button for quick contact.
SEO should target provided welding/fabrication keywords.
Hero headline text should exclude the word "Complete" (use "Welding & Metal Fabrication Solutions").
Logo mark container/frame should be circular (not square).
Hero/Home background should use a modern welding-themed visual/background.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Modern welding workshop background with sparks and equipment, dark industrial tone (hero-welding-modern-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)

existing_features.title: Build a single-page, mobile-responsive business website for "SK Welding Works" with these sections in order: Hero, About Us, Services, Why Choose Us, Gallery, Contact, Footer. Include a top navigation with anchor links to each section and enable smooth scrolling between sections.

Implement the Hero section content exactly as provided: Headline "Complete Welding & Metal Fabrication Solutions", subheading "From MIG & ARC Welding to Custom Metal Work – We Handle All Welding Jobs", and a primary CTA button labeled "Call Now for Free Quote" that uses a configurable phone number via a tel: link.
Create the About Us section using the provided paragraph (verbatim) and present it in a clean, professional layout with clear typography.

Implement the Services section as a responsive grid of cards with icons for each service: MIG Welding, ARC Welding, Pipe Bending, Gate & Grill Work, Metal Fabrication, Custom Welding Projects. Each card must include a short 2–3 line English description aligned with the provided hints (e.g., MIG: clean/strong welds; ARC: heavy-duty structural; Pipe Bending: precise machine bending).

Implement a "Why Choose Us" section listing these points with clear check/indicator styling: Skilled Workers, Modern Machines, Strong & Clean Finishing, On-Time Delivery, Reasonable Pricing, All Welding Work Under One Roof.

Create a Gallery section displaying a grid of placeholder images representing welding work, machines, gates/grills, pipes, and metal frames/structures. Use locally served static assets (no remote hotlinking).

Implement the Contact section including: a configurable phone number, a WhatsApp button (linking to wa.me using a configurable WhatsApp number), a configurable email, a configurable workshop address, and a simple inquiry form with fields (Name, Phone, Message). Provide client-side validation and show a success/failure message after submit.
Add a floating WhatsApp button that remains visible while scrolling and links to the same configurable WhatsApp number.

Create a professional industrial visual theme consistent across the site: dark gray base with yellow/orange accents, bold headings, and clean fonts. Apply consistent spacing, section separators, and hover/focus states suitable for a trustworthy, business-focused website.

Implement SEO basics: set page title and meta description for "SK Welding Works" and include the provided SEO keywords in appropriate meta tags and on-page content where reasonable. Add structured, semantic HTML (proper headings, section labels, accessible links).

Build the Footer with: business name, quick links to site sections, working hours (use clearly marked placeholder hours if not provided), and social media icons that link to configurable placeholder URLs.
Update the Hero section main heading text to remove the word "Complete" so the headline reads exactly: "Welding & Metal Fabrication Solutions".
Change the logo presentation to use a circular frame (not square) anywhere the logo is shown in the header/navigation and the hero branding area.

Update the Home/Hero background to use a modern welding-themed background image/visual while keeping text readable (ensure adequate contrast for the hero heading, subheading, and buttons). Add the background image as a local static asset and reference it from the hero section (no remote image hotlinking).

Implement Services section as icon cards with 2–3 line descriptions for MIG, ARC, Pipe Bending, Gate & Grill Work, Metal Fabrication, and Custom Welding Projects

Add Gallery section with placeholder images representing welding work, machines, gates/grills, pipes, and metal frames/structures
SEO optimization including target keywords ("welding shop near me", "all welding work", "metal fabrication service", "MIG welding", "ARC welding", "pipe bending service")

Implement backend support for inquiry submissions: store submitted inquiries (name, phone, message, timestamp) in canister memory and expose a canister method to create an inquiry. Ensure the frontend form calls this method on submit.
Update Hero main heading to remove the word "Complete" (Headline should be "Welding & Metal Fabrication Solutions")
Change logo frame/container styling from square to circular
Update Home/Hero background to a modern welding-themed background image/visual
